snippet: Among the fast-shifting events in Iraq in recent days, an added source of confusion has been the name of the Sunni extremist group at the center of the fighting.
abstract: Among the fast-shifting events in Iraq in recent days, an added source of confusion has been the name of the Sunni extremist group at the center of the fighting.

headline.main: What to Call the Extremists in Iraq?

keywords.name: organizations
